answers.answer: Fibro with other conditions. It's iffy about the CFS because fibro also leaves one with great fatigue.

CFS diagnosis was a bit iffy...the neurologist didn't seem to want to use those exact words.  He didn't use the words "Post-Viral Fatigue Syndrome" exactly either, but that's what he clearly described.

Fibro, degenerative disk disease, degenerative osteo-arthritis, Type 2 diabetes, diabetic neuropathy, carpal tunnel syndrome both hands 2 bulging disks, spinal stenosis. At one time CFS, but no other dr has mentioned it in past 8 years.

question: How many of you have fibro, CFS or do you have both conditions ?
title: What is Your Diagnosis ?
